title: What it will be like watching my brother play for England in a Rugby World Cup semi-final
text:
It is definitely pretty cool having a brother who is about to play in a World Cup semi-final. Anthony has had some incredible moments in his career to date, with his first cap and starting all three games for the Lions obvious standouts.

But this will be very, very special, particularly because he has done so well to come back from tearing his Achilles tendon twice in the last two years. You worry about how that will affect you but he was so focused on his rehab and has come back even better than before.

Personally I find it much harder watching him than playing myself so I will be...
description: It is definitely pretty cool having a brother who is about to play in a World Cup semi-final.
